item.description:
Susan Allen for U.S. Congress, 9/11 Truth candidate, petitioning this weekend

Anyone who wishes to help petition to get a true 9/11 candidate on the ballot

Meet on Saturday may go to the Whole Foods supermarket at 647 Washington St., Newton.

Either Crystal or I will be there petitioning between 10am and 2pm....and will help guide any volunteers who arrive at that location.

Volunteers should bring a hat and some sun block.

Email Rich for more information at: RichAucoin@comcast.net

###

Susan and her supporters will be out in force this Saturday, June 7.

We need to collect 1700 more signatures by July 29th, so we must get serious about achieving this goal.

Please contact me if you can join in on the fun. If you need DVDs and/or literature, let us know.
With your help, we can put a truly bold 9-11 Truth candidate on the ballot this year!

Please rsvp.

truth@boston911truth.org


Susan Allen For Congress:

The Susan Allen for U.S. Congress campaign will hammer on two main issues:
1. Expose the 9-11 Coverup.
2. Abolish the Federal reserve.

When Susan is asked to address other issues (such as abortion, environment, healthcare, etc) she will address them in brief terms (1 or two sentences) that are designed to redirect attention back to the above two issues whenever possible.

Everyone helping to collect signatures for Susan Allen's campaign will be encouraged to wear 9-11 gear, hand out 9-11 literature and offer DVDs to voters. (Please keep all DVDs and literature focused on the campaign's two main issues.)

A free "Investigate 9-11" T shirt will be awarded to any/all petitioners who fill up a petition sheet for Susan's campaign. (That's 25 signatures.)

###
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP and we will send you instructions on when and where to meet. Coolidge Corner in Brookline, Newton and other locations during afternoon hours.
item.why: Get a real 9/11 Truth candidate on the ballot for Congress!

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Susan Allen for U.S. Congress, 9/11 Truth candidate, petitioning this weekend
